main.name: Ali Rahimi
main.description:
Assign me with some tasks, I'll find the solutions and get it done.
Experienced in develpement of complex android applications with the old (JAVA) and "hot" stacks (Kotlin, JetPack(MVVM,ROOM,DATABINDING,etc), DI(with Dagger) etc.
main.bio: Geek, Freelancer, Open Source Advocate, Linux Lover. I'm an introvert, don't expect leadership skills. Lover of Music and Cinema
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage:
I'm an engineer, I have an overview of many areas such as Software Engineering principals (OOP, user-centeric approach to design apps, Database Desgin, Software Architecture etc) , Algorithms, Network Security (SSL,RSA,AES,etc), Network Layers(IP, TCP/UDP, etc).
 I don't really care about the STACK that much, but it should be at least a modern one, I won't work in ancient languages.

work.title: Full front-end Android Developer
work.description: The very first application I wrote with Android SDK. Artistic Pantomime Game/Application with cool UX and UI written in Java for android 2.1 to 4.0. The APK still works perfectly in android 10 !!

work.title: Full front-end IOS Developer
work.description: I learned native iOS development with Swift by developing an existing android application to iOS. I really liked and appreciated the Apple Architecture Design guidelines (MVC)

work.title: Full front-end Android Developer
work.description: Android Online and Offline Game/Application written in Java. Features: Notifactions for everything, Restfull and Web Sockets Communication With Server, Registration/Friend Managment/Chat, Encrypted Coin System, Analytics and etc.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
